txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Heavy sword sheaths from the intelligent foes in Agamaur. Bring them to Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
'These will do nicely to shield our weapons from the ravages of this land.\n\n'Thank you.'
'The swamp destroys metal quickly, and much of our gear is in ill repair or worse. We can repair the sword sheaths of our enemies and use that leather to preserve our own.'
Eriac the Strong, at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur, desires heavy sword sheaths from the intelligent foes found in Agamaur.
Deliver the heavy sword sheaths to Eriac the Strong at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur
You accepted a task from Eriac the Strong to acquire heavy sword sheaths from the intelligent foes within Agamaur. You can find Eriac the Strong within the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
Wanted: Heavy sword sheaths from the intelligent foes in Agamaur.
